dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kazakhstan's Ministry of Internal Affairs just launched a pilot for online ID card applications.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazakhstan's Ministry of Internal Affairs just launched a pilot for online I D card applications.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Ministry of Internal Affairs and the Ministry of Digital Development have published the relevant order.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh wow, so you can do it through the e-government portal or the app?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh wow, so you can do it through the e-government portal or the app?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: You will be able to apply for a new ID card via the e-government website or mobile app once your current ID nears its expiration date.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. It's for when your current ID is about to expire—like, uh, within 30 days of the expiration date.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. It's for when your current I D is about to expire-like, uh, within thirty days of the expiration date.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As noted by the Ministry of Internal Affairs, this service will be available if 30 days or less remain until the ID expires, or if the expiration date passed no more than 10 days ago.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Or even if it expired no more than 10 days ago, right? I saw that detail.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or even if it expired no more than ten days ago, right? I saw that detail.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As noted by the Ministry of Internal Affairs, this service will be available if 30 days or less remain until the ID expires, or if the expiration date passed no more than 10 days ago.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's the window. It's all about streamlining public services, making things more efficient.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's the window. It's all about streamlining public services, making things more efficient.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the order, a pilot project is being launched to issue identity cards online in order to improve the efficiency of public services in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And this pilot runs until March 31st, 2026—so they's giving it a solid test period.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And this pilot runs until March thirty first, twenty twenty six-so they's giving it a solid test period.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The joint order of the ministries comes into effect from the date of its first official publication and will remain valid until March 31, 2026.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's a joint effort between the Ministry of Internal Affairs and the Ministry, which makes sense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a joint effort between the Ministry of Internal Affairs and the Ministry, which makes sense.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Ministry of Internal Affairs and the Ministry of Digital Development have published the relevant order.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. I mean, having both digital and internal affairs experts on board is key for something like this.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. I mean, having both digital and internal affairs experts on board is key for something like this.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure, it reduces so much hassle. No more taking time off work to wait at some office.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure, it reduces so much hassle. No more taking time off work to wait at some office.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And if it works well, maybe they'll expand it to other documents too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And if it works well, maybe they'll expand it to other documents too.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. This feels like a step toward, uh, full digital governance in the future.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. This feels like a step toward, uh, full digital governance in the future.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Let's hope the rollout goes smoothly. Pilot projects can sometimes have hiccups.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Let's hope the rollout goes smoothly. Pilot projects can sometimes have hiccups.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: True, but starting with a clear expiration window is smart—limits the scope initially.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True, but starting with a clear expiration window is smart-limits the scope initially.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and if people adapt well, it could become permanent.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and if people adapt well, it could become permanent.
